column1: For example, find out if your hospital has: - A floor or unit that does only the type of surgery you are having (For example, for hip replacement surgery, do they have a floor or unit that is used only for joint-replacement surgeries?)

- Operating rooms that are used only for your type of surgery - Specific guidelines so that everyone who has your type of surgery receives the kind of care they need - Enough nurses It can also be helpful to know how many surgeries like yours have been done at the hospital you have chosen or are considering for your surgery.
